com.inrix.sdk.utils

Class GeoUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.utils.GeoUtils

  • public final class GeoUtils
extends Object
    Contains useful static methods for geographical calculations.

               Location location2)
        Calculates bearing between two locations.
        Parameters:
        location1 - First location.
        location2 - Second location.
        Returns:
        Bearing, value in range (0.0, 360.0], if available; Float.NaN otherwise.

      • distanceKM

        public static double distanceKM(double lat1,
                double lon1,
                double lat2,
                double lon2)
        Returns the distance in kilometers between two points defined by longitude and latitude. Uses the rough great circle distance.
        Parameters:
        lat1 - The latitude of the first point.
        lon1 - The longitude of the first point.
        lat2 - The latitude of the second point.
        lon2 - The longitude of the second point.
        Returns:
        The distance between the two points in kilometers.

      • distanceKM

        public static double distanceKM(GeoPoint point1,
                GeoPoint point2)
        Returns the distance in kilometers between two points. Uses the rough great circle distance.
        Parameters:
        point1 - The first point.
        point2 - The second point.
        Returns:
        The distance between the two points in kilometers.

      • getAreaOfBox

        public static double getAreaOfBox(GeoPoint corner1,
                  GeoPoint corner2,
                  UserPreferences.Unit outputUnits)
        Returns the area of a rectangle defined by two corners that are diagonally opposite each other.
        Parameters:
        corner1 - The first corner of the rectangle.
        corner2 - The second corner of the rectangle.
        outputUnits - The units of the returned area.
        Returns:
        The area of the rectangular region.

      • getAreaOfCircle

        public static double getAreaOfCircle(double radius)
        Returns the area of a circle with the specified radius.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the circle.
        Returns:
        The area of the circular region.

      • pointsToLocations

        Convert list of GeoPoint into list of Location.
        Parameters:
        points - list of GeoPoint.
        Returns:
        list of Location.

      • getCenter

        public static GeoPoint getCenter(GeoPoint corner1,
                 GeoPoint corner2)
        Gets the bounding box center from specified corners.
        Parameters:
        corner1 - Bounding box corner 1.
        corner2 - Bounding box corner 2, opposite to corner1.
        Returns:
        Center of the bounding box, or null if one of the corners are invalid.

      • createBoxFromPoints

        public static BoundingBox createBoxFromPoints(List<GeoPoint> points)
        Calculates a BoundingBox from a list of points with BoundingBox.getCorner1() returning the minimum lat/lon and BoundingBox.getCorner2() returning the maximum lat/lon. If there are no valid points supplied in the list, then the resulting box will return maximum lat/lon (+90/+180) as corner 1 and minimum lat/lon (-90/-180) as corner 2.
        Parameters:
        points - The points to calculate a box from.
        Returns:
        Bounding box or null if the list of points is null.

      • getMetersPerDegree

        @NonNull
public static double[] getMetersPerDegree(@NonNull
                                  GeoPoint point)
        Get the meters per degree at the supplied point.
        Parameters:
        point - The point to get the meters per degree at.
        Returns:
        A double array of size 2, where index 0 is equal to the latitudinal meters per degree and index 1 is equal to the longitudinal meters per degree.

      • computeOffset

        public static GeoPoint computeOffset(GeoPoint from,
                     double distance,
                     double heading)
        Returns the GeoPoint resulting from moving a distance from an origin in the specified heading (expressed in degrees clockwise from north).
        Parameters:
        from - The GeoPoint from which to start.
        distance - The distance to travel.
        heading - The heading in degrees clockwise from north.
        Returns:
        Offset GeoPoint.

      • computeDistanceBetween

        public static double computeDistanceBetween(Location from,
                            Location to)
        Returns the distance between two geopositions, in meters.
        Parameters:
        from - Start location.
        to - End location.
        Returns:
        Distance between Locations, in meters.

      • computeDistanceBetween

        public static double computeDistanceBetween(GeoPoint from,
                            GeoPoint to)
        Returns the distance between two geopositions, in meters.
        Parameters:
        from - Start geopoint.
        to - End geopoint.
        Returns:
        Distance between GeoPoints, in meters.
